spec.name: Green Hill Park
spec.description: Green Hill Park (Parc Green Hill) is a public park located in the eastern or suburban area of Casablanca, such as the Sidi Moumen district. It provides a large, much-needed green space for the surrounding residential community, functioning as a recreational oasis. The park offers landscaped grounds, often with elevated areas suggested by the name ('Hill'), providing space for physical activity and relaxation.
